SEARCH
Package com.interiordesignplanner.room

Class RoomService

java.lang.Object
com.interiordesignplanner.room.RoomService
@Service public class RoomService extends Object
Manages business logic related to rooms within a project.

Responsibilities include creating, updating, retrieving and deleting room specifications, such as dimensions, type, maintaining checklists and change logs, and associating rooms with projects and tasks. Serves as an interface between controllers and the persistence layer.

  • Method Details

    • getAllRooms

      public List<Room> getAllRooms()
      Returns all rooms created for projects on the system.

    • getRoomsByType

      public List<Room> getRoomsByType(String type) throws RoomNotFoundException
      Gets all rooms with the same room type.

      Returns all rooms with the same a room type to narrow down the search and help with auditing Custom query created in the repository.

      Parameters:
      type - room type enum
      Throws:
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room type is not found

    • getRoom

      public Room getRoom(Long id)
      Returns a room using their roomId.

      Used to access a specific room within a project for updates or design changes.

      Parameters:
      id - project's unique identifier
      Throws:
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room is not found

    • addRoom

      @Transactional public Room addRoom(Room room, Long projectId) throws IllegalArgumentException
      One to One relationship with Project happens atomically, so if one fails, neither is persisted.

      Add a room to an existing project. The room will be linked to the specified project and assigned a unique identifier.

      Parameters:
      room - room object to be created
      projectId - project's unique identifier
      Returns:
      room with a generated unique Id
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if room fields are null

    • updateRoom

      public Room updateRoom(Long id, Room room) throws RoomNotFoundException
      Updates a existing room details.

      Modifys room details such as dimensions, style or checklist and changes.

      Parameters:
      id - room's unique identifier
      room - room object to be created
      Returns:
      updates room
      Throws:
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room is not found

    • deleteRoom

      public void deleteRoom(Long id) throws RoomNotFoundException
      Deletes a existing room. *

      Use this method when a room is removed from the project scope. Deletion will respect the defined cascade and orphan removal settings.

      Parameters:
      id - room's unique identifier
      Throws:
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room doesnt exist

    • reassignProject

      public Room reassignProject(Long projectId, Long roomId) throws RoomNotFoundException
      Reassigns room to a existing project.

      Use this method when a room is assigned to the wrong project and needs to be reassigned. It will update the many to one relationship.

      Parameters:
      projectId - project's unique identifier
      roomId - room's unique identifier
      Returns:
      room is reassigned
      Throws:
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room doesnt exist
